DOC.detailed_description: Weight loss mainly result reduction daily caloric intake . Hence many people interested count track daily caloric intake In fact 9 % people USA accurately estimate number calorie eat ( International Food Information Council Foundation , May 2011 ) According well-known method investigator need know caloric value every component dish meal . For example : Breakfast contains glass orange juice , small bagel , spread cream cheese shall calculate : orange juice 90 kcal + bagel 192 kcal +cream cheese 98 kcal=total 380 kcal . This method complicate , especially investigator need calculate dish ingredient straightforward : Cob salad Shepherd 's pie , Even slice pizza , difficult estimate fat , carbohydrate protein piece pie contains let alone caloric volume . The investigator propose new method call `` The category method '' : single categorical estimation per meal base set five category : Category 1 less 200 kcal , Category 2 200-500 kcal , Category 3 501-800 kcal , Category 4 801-1200 kcal , Category 5 1200 kcal After choose category investigator use average category ( e.g. , category 3 : 500-800 Avg = 650 kcal ) . Using Breakfast description : meal consider category No . 2 ( 200-500 Kcal ) , chicken rice restaurant consider category 4 ( 800-1200 Kcal ) . This method simplifies process count calorie , especially assemble cooked meal , make easy track give meal even familiar caloric value product .
